content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x)

### Coal Extraction Point at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1)

### Iron Plate Production
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position y) for smelting iron ore into iron plates
- Assembling machine (position z) for crafting iron gear wheels and iron sticks

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure you have enough iron plates in your inventory before attempting to craft items that require them. For example, crafting iron gear wheels requires 2 iron plates.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
